query:
{
  Purl(purlId:"update_purlId"){
    purlId
    name
    description
    isActive
    purlOwner
    prntPurlId
    purlType
    thumbnail
    createdBy
    createdOn
    modifiedBy
    modifiedOn
    templateId
    slides{
      slideName
      slideNo
      orderBy
      hideSlide
      isLocked
      slideOwner
      components{
        type
        name
        id
        locked
        componentLayer
      }
      
    }
  }
}
